alert.note: Alert for Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Phelps and northwestern Kearney Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Funk, or near Holdrege, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Funk around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Axtell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
